Description: Location of the QA Package root directory.
Location of staged SCDM tables under review.

Notes.1: If multiple paths are necessary, delimit with a single space

Description: Specifies the enrollment table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the demographic table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the dispensing table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the encounter table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the diagnosis table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the procedure table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the facility table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the provider table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the laboratory results table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
Specifies the death table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
Specifies the cause of death table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
Specifies the vital signs table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
Specifies the inpatient pharmacy table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
Specifies the inpatient transfusion table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
Specifies the prescribing table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
Specifies the patient reported measures survey table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
Specifies the patient reported measures response table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
Specifies the feature engineering table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
Name of file, including library reference, that lists patients to be excluded from snapshot-specific output files
Parameter indicating if the Common Components module should run.

Notes.1: If left blank, parameter will default to N

Description: Local ETL and Phase-specific (NOT request specific) request folder root for DPLOCAL subfolder. When combined with parameters from the master program file for a specific production request, the full path(s) specific to that request are dynamically generated.

Notes.1: For most Data Partners, all root-path parameters will point to the same directory.

Description: Local ETL and Phase-specific (NOT request specific) request folder root for INPUTFILES subfolder. When combined with parameters from the master program file for a specific production request, the full path(s) specific to that request are dynamically generated.

Notes.1: For most Data Partners, all root-path parameters will point to the same directory.

Description: Local ETL and Phase-specific (NOT request specific) request folder root for MSOC subfolder. When combined with parameters from the master program file for a specific production request, the full path(s) specific to that request are dynamically generated.

Notes.1: For most Data Partners, all root-path parameters will point to the same directory.

Description: Local ETL and Phase-specific (NOT request specific) request folder root for SASPROGRAMS subfolder. When combined with parameters from the master program file for a specific production request, the full path(s) specific to that request are dynamically generated.

Notes.1: For most Data Partners, all root-path parameters will point to the same directory.

Description: Project identifier for internal SOC identification and tracking
Work plan type for internal SOC identification and tracking.

Notes.1: This value is used to conditionally select the appropriate inputfiles for the distributed database type.

Valid Values: `qar`: Used for package distributions aimed at Sentinel Distributed Database Data Partners
`qcr`: Used for package distributions aimed at Rapid COVID Distributed Database Data Partners

Description: Work plan identifier for internal SOC identification and tracking.

Notes.2: Should be used to uniquely identify packages distributed against given ETL

Description: Data Partner identifier for internal SOC identification and tracking.
Version identifier for internal SOC identification and tracking. Should track each re-distribution of the package (if multiple distributions are required).
ETL Number for this request.
Parameter indicating whether the Mother-Infant Identification Program should run.

Notes.1: If left blank, parameter will default to N

Description: Specifies whether a three or five digit ZIP code value is available.
Parameter indicating the version of the Sentinel Common Data Model in which the data the QA Package is to run against is formated.
